Name: Rob
AboutMe:
Electronic engineer, broadcast engineer, turned programmer, turned web developer. Experienced in C, assembly, Go, Javascript, Objective-C, Cordova/Phonegap, PHP, Apache, Nginx, Node and any web technology you can throw at me. Started and stopped learning Lisp and Haskell for years.

Worked for Silicon Graphics, Pixar and designed the equipment your eye surgeon used. Web developer for theatrical sites in Chicago. Published in Byte magazine back when it mattered.

Didn't get to know Philip Seymour Hoffman well enough.
Met Tom Hardy and didn't know it.
Had Gerard Butler's personal cell number at one time.
Worked in radio/TV and you can see my face in a couple of Hollywood movies.

Yes, I am that famous.
